summary: Comprehensive testing of warehouse management, loading/unloading workflows, parcel tracking, and UI/UX improvements. Backend tests: 16 passed, 0 failed. Frontend: All requested features verified working.

minor.issue: Console warning: <tr> cannot be child of <span> in ParcelIntake table

issues: Number input widths (74-84px) could be slightly wider for better readability - minor enhancement

critical_code_review_comments: React hydration warning in ParcelIntake - span element wrapping tr elements
Missing unique key prop warning in Finance TableBody component
Missing aria-describedby warning in DialogContent component
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during pytest runs with TEST_ prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified working: Warehouse client filter, verification checkbox, Loading/Unloading mode toggle, manual move checkboxes, trip status buttons, input field improvements, and Recipient column in Add Parcels modal.

warehouse_page.verification_checkbox_column: PASS - Verified column with checkboxes in table
warehouse_page.mark_collected_button: PASS - Button appears in floating action bar for arrived parcels (tested via API)

loading_staging_page.manual_move_checkboxes: PASS - Checkboxes in staging and truck tables
loading_staging_page.staging_truck_toggle: PASS - Staging/Truck toggle with parcels display

unloading_mode.return_to_transit_button: PASS - Return to Transit button available
unloading_mode.mark_trip_delivered: PASS - Mark Trip Delivered button present

trip_detail_page.status_action_buttons: PASS - Mark as Loading button visible in header

parcel_intake_page.right_aligned_numbers: PASS - text-align: right on numeric inputs

invoice_editor.right_aligned_numbers: PASS - text-align: right on numeric inputs
invoice_editor.add_parcels_modal_recipient: PASS - Modal shows Recipient column in table headers

api_endpoints.PUT /api/warehouse/parcels/bulk-collect: PASS - Bulk collect for arrived parcels
api_endpoints.GET /api/warehouse/filters: PASS - Returns clients, destinations, trips, statuses
